pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>

</details>
Looks good to me, but didn't look at proofs at all. I hope we can get this in soon, feel free to ping me if there's no movement and I'll hit merge!

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10085858293/job/27887417882)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10085858293/job/27887418418)

```suggestion
  A family `{ eᵢ }` of orthogonal idempotent elements is complete if `∑ eᵢ = 1`.
```

```suggestion
  then every idempotent in the range of `f` lifts to a unique idempotent in `R`.
```
I assume (parts) of this section can be generalised from demanding `R` to be commutative to demanding the idempotents involved to be central.
Thanks! I've generalised some lemmas by assuming centrality. Lemmas concerning quotients and products cannot be generalised though, and I've kept them as is.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(RingTheory/Idempotents): Lifting complete orthogonal idempotents along nil extensions
